transArray.content: The room is very clean and hygienic. There are paper towels on the table which are very convenient to reach. The whole room is spotlessly clean. Once you enter, the spacious and bright windows of the room face the road and the lighting is very good. When you open the window, the air outside is quite fresh. , there is a small park just a few steps away, where you can go and exercise. There is also a free self-service laundry room on the first floor of the lobby. It is very convenient to dry directly after washing. The staff are also very well-educated and polite! ! Very satisfied! ! ! ! !
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing me. You are not a dim star, but the entire galaxy that encompasses the bright moon. I love you, little man.
